import pdfplumber

pdf_path = "/Users/fanshengxia/Desktop/周报V2/输出结果/多资产投资部产品周报-20260129.pdf"

with pdfplumber.open(pdf_path) as pdf:
    print(f"Total pages: {len(pdf.pages)}")
    print("=" * 80)
    
    for i, page in enumerate(pdf.pages):
        print(f"\n{'='*80}")
        print(f"PAGE {i+1} (size: {page.width:.0f} x {page.height:.0f})")
        print(f"{'='*80}")
        
        text = page.extract_text()
        if text:
            # Print first 2000 chars of each page to capture headings and structure
            lines = text.strip().split('\n')
            for line in lines[:50]:  # first 50 lines
                print(line)
            if len(lines) > 50:
                print(f"... ({len(lines) - 50} more lines)")
        else:
            print("[No extractable text - likely an image-only page]")
        
        # Check for tables
        tables = page.extract_tables()
        if tables:
            print(f"\n[Contains {len(tables)} table(s)]")
            for ti, table in enumerate(tables):
                if table and len(table) > 0:
                    print(f"  Table {ti+1}: {len(table)} rows x {len(table[0]) if table[0] else 0} cols")
                    # Print header row
                    if table[0]:
                        print(f"  Headers: {table[0][:10]}")  # first 10 cols
        
        # Check for images
        images = page.images
        if images:
            print(f"\n[Contains {len(images)} image(s)]")

PYEOF

python3 << 'PYEOF'
import pdfplumber

pdf_path = "/Users/fanshengxia/Desktop/周报V2/输出结果/多资产投资部产品周报-20260129.pdf"

with pdfplumber.open(pdf_path) as pdf:
    print(f"Total pages: {len(pdf.pages)}")
    print("=" * 80)
    
    for i, page in enumerate(pdf.pages):
        text = page.extract_text()
        tables = page.extract_tables()
        images = page.images
        
        # Extract key identifying info per page
        heading = ""
        first_lines = []
        if text:
            lines = [l.strip() for l in text.strip().split('\n') if l.strip()]
            first_lines = lines[:8]
        
        print(f"\nPAGE {i+1}:")
        print(f"  Text lines: {len(lines) if text else 0}")
        print(f"  Tables: {len(tables) if tables else 0}", end="")
        if tables:
            for ti, t in enumerate(tables):
                rows = len(t) if t else 0
                cols = len(t[0]) if t and t[0] else 0
                print(f" [{rows}x{cols}]", end="")
        print()
        print(f"  Images: {len(images) if images else 0}")
        print(f"  First lines:")
        for fl in first_lines:
            print(f"    | {fl[:120]}")

PYEOF
